title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's fit, quality, and color, particularly appreciating its nice shade of blue.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm light weight quality
items.body: The smooth, close but not snug fit in small is perfect for warmth and style on me size 6 , 110 lbs, 5’3”. Light weight but warm and easy to wear inside and under jackets. Cardigans are more versatile than pullovers. Lovely quality! Read more
items.author: Bo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars NOT a 2X
items.body: This is a nice sweater. But it's no where even close to what Americans think of as a 2X I normally wear a 1X and this is too tight to even button up. However a friend loved it (she normally wears a large) and it fits her great so I passed it along to her Read more
items.author: kweaz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wear this almost every day
items.body: I heard about this sweater from a magazine review and had to try it - and it's so soft! I have worn it almost every day when the weather calls for a cardigan. I got a size larger than I normally wear and that works for being casual but if you want a more fitted look order your usual size. It's held up remarkably well - I comb it to remove any pills. Again, it's super soft! It's thick enough to be toasty when required (and feel a bit more luxurious) and you will enjoy wearing it! I would buy it in all the colors and am thinking of buying one in my regular size for less casual occasions. Read more
items.author: Raptorpen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cashmere sweater
items.body: Great quality and color. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: kitty fryer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color
items.body: It’s a more dull blue than pictured Read more
items.author: mary

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars soft, accurate size, medium weight, Great!
items.body: This sweater is soft comfortable warm and accurate to the size. It is medium weight. I like it very much and would recommend it. Read more
items.author: Jen H

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars This Isn't Cashmere: Because I Know Cashmere! TRUST ME ON THIS
items.body: It was suggested to me on the item page to order a size Large. After looking at the sizing, and reading reviews, I decided to purchase the size Medium. WAY TOO BIG. I had to roll up the sleeves THREE TIMES, and I'm 5'7 in my bare feet, with long arms! Further, the fabric is scratchy feeling and not soft. I own other cashmere sweaters from Lands' End, and JJill. This cardigan made by State Cashmere isn't cashmere, at least not 100%; I don't know what its actual wool content is, but it's NOT cashmere. Possibly it's a blend, but that's not good enough for the price point, and deceptive when the tag reads 100% cashmere, and the advertising up front states that it is. It was also extremely static-y when I pulled it out of the package, and extremely wrinkled with the cardboard filler piece almost bent in half, like someone else's return, haphazardly shoved back into the packaging bag. At least the tag was still intact on the sweater, on the inside back of the neck/shoulder area. Also, the top button on the crew neck placket wasn't sewn on straight and level with the rest of the cardigan buttons, so that it pulled and looked awful, not matching the otherwise straight line I got with the cardigan completely buttoned and closed. That button should have been caught by quality control, and resewn properly, unless it was a bigger issue of the buttonhole for it also not being placed and sewn properly. Additionally, didn't like the plastic buttons; these ones are huge in proportion to the photograph of this cardigan in the Bella Blue color (personally I prefer shell buttons on a cashmere cardigan, but these are really, REALLY big buttons). Please see photo while in the packaging for reference and then look at the cardigan in the display photo(s). Like another reviewer also stated, the blue color is very dull and unattractive in comparison to the display photos. Meh! For further reference on the sizing, I usually wear a size 6-8 or size Small/Small Tall, and have a very small frame at 105-108 lbs. In conclusion, for all of these reasons, I am returning this. Read more
items.author: SRD

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: It fits well and is a nice shade of blue. I will find it very wearable when the weather turns colder. Read more
items.author: Mary White

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Undyed White, Pale Charcoal, Bella Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
